name: places/ChIJ-Y3l7mL2wokR5y_fykpvlgM
adrFormatAddress: 3577 Broadway, New York, NY 10031-3208, USA

originalText.text: I came here last minute to get my bridesmaid dress hemmed. The woman who assisted me was so kind and quick. I needed the dress ready in under 3 days and she was able to deliver! I'd def come again and recommended it to others in the area. The location is small but it usually isn't busy.

text.text: I came here last minute to get my bridesmaid dress hemmed. The woman who assisted me was so kind and quick. I needed the dress ready in under 3 days and she was able to deliver! I'd def come again and recommended it to others in the area. The location is small but it usually isn't busy.

originalText.text: I use Natural Care Cleaners for all of my dry cleaning, usually for suits and sweaters. They've always been fantastic and have returned my clothes on-time and spotlessly clean.  Plus, they're relatively inexpensive: a few years ago I was living in a much cheaper city and we only able to find dry cleaners who were 1) worse and 2) more expensive.

text.text: I use Natural Care Cleaners for all of my dry cleaning, usually for suits and sweaters. They've always been fantastic and have returned my clothes on-time and spotlessly clean.  Plus, they're relatively inexpensive: a few years ago I was living in a much cheaper city and we only able to find dry cleaners who were 1) worse and 2) more expensive.

originalText.text: If I could give this place 0 stars, I would. I asked for light/medium starch on my clothes and 2 of the 7 shirts I delivered were ruined due to discolorations from applying too much starch. The remaining items were so heavily starched that I had to get them dry cleaned a second time at a different establishment to salvage them. Their prices are also higher than average and I found the service to be poor. Strongly recommend avoiding this establishment as a whole as you'll be at risk of having multiple items of clothing ruined.

originalText.text: Ive been using them for 3 years now almost weekly with very expensive suits and shirts. Always very fast and very good cleaning. I highly recommend them.

originalText.text: I love this place! Been doing my wash and fold here for almost a year, and they are so kind and professional. Good prices too.
